#summary A knob input control

= Knob Control =

http://lh4.ggpht.com/_esUBlqKjDzk/Sbla7CYaF8I/AAAAAAAAAyU/t3fZc6LksD4/boton.png

This component allows the user of a JavaFX app to input data using a virtual knob (similar to a slider).

 * [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cp2es9SGJVc Video with a demo]
 * [http://javafxdemo.appspot.com/jfx/Knob.jnlp Java Web Start demo]

Documentation:

 * [knobSetup Setting up a knob control]
 * [knobOptions Knob control setup options]
 * [knobTypes Basic knob types]
 * [knobValues Getting the value from a knob control]
 * [knobFunctions Knob control functions]
 * [knobExamples Examples of knobs]
 * [knobKnobtypedef Defining a new type of Knob]
